channel.title: {Totally serious class suggestion} average BD player
channel.description:
**_Name - average BD_** **_Faction - says BD but make sure to kill BD_** **_Type - dumb_**
**Passive 1** - what game am I playing - instantly lose 1000 iq
**Passive 2** - again - if you get a good class then you will instantly die n1 for no reason
**Day Ability 1** - really - if someone is confirmed good make sure to execute then that day
**Day Ability 2** - why me - this ability can only be used when you're on trial. When you use this your character says "why me, EVIL KING!!"
**Night ability 1** - I know I know but look at my name - instantly change your name to a meme and avoid all information about the actual game.
**Night ability 2** - lost all hope - when you click this the TOL game will automatically close preventing you from losing more brain cells.
**Win condition** - try to keep your sanity
**Alternate passive** - instantly wonder why they added inquisitor and sorcerer instead of queen. I bet more then half of people playing TOL don't even know what a inquisitor was until they heard of it in game. Many people still dont know what it is still
This Is obviously a joke class picking on BD players that I play with. But other then that I truly love this game and can't wait for more content to be added

item.title: {Totally serious class suggestion} average BD player
item.dc:creator: NOBLE1
item.description:
Yeah. If you get a good BD class then you die n1. It’s just the rules.

Read full topic
item.source: {Totally serious class suggestion} average BD player

item.description:
Name - average BD
Faction - says BD but make sure to kill BD
Type - dumb

Passive 1 - what game am I playing - instantly lose 1000 iq

Passive 2 - again - if you get a good class then you will instantly die n1 for no reason

Day Ability 1 - really - if someone is confirmed good make sure to execute then that day

Day Ability 2 - why me - this ability can only be used when you’re on trial. When you use this your character says “why me, EVIL KING!!”

Night ability 1 - I know I know but look at my name - instantly change your name to a meme and avoid all information about the actual game.

Night ability 2 - lost all hope - when you click this the TOL game will automatically close preventing you from losing more brain cells.

Win condition - try to keep your sanity

Alternate passive - instantly wonder why they added inquisitor and sorcerer instead of queen. I bet more then half of people playing TOL don’t even know what a inquisitor was until they heard of it in game. Many people still dont know what it is still

This Is obviously a joke class picking on BD players that I play with. But other then that I truly love this game and can’t wait for more content to be added
